effect.black_white: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap. This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball. This ability is not disabled during roost.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap. This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball. This ability is not disabled during roost.

flavor_text.black_white: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
